title: Ewout:
overview: Report series in which Ewout Genemans dives into various social arenas and walks along with those involved. Ewout discovers the dark side of the paradise island of Cura√ßao and goes into an internment at a juvenile detention center in the Netherlands where he sees how young criminal the Netherlands is now. He also follows girls who, under pressure from social media, have plastic surgery performed in Turkey. And that can involve major risks.
